title: ERROR powchain: Subscription to new head notifier failed error=websocket: close 1006 (abnormal closure): unexpected EOF

body: Was this an error you saw only once? Your node kept running after it?

I encountered the same here:

Afterwards the client continues to run but did not process blocks any more, there's just p2p connect & disconnect messages and more repetitions of the same error:

> ERROR powchain: Subscription to new head notifier failed error=websocket: close 1006 (abnormal closure): unexpected EOF

still getting those errors:

> Was this an error you saw only once? Your node kept running after it?

1) no, saw it again other times, above the errors when I was running the node today. 
2) yes, ran continued after error:

**[2020-01-18 16:23:13] ERROR powchain: Subscription to new head notifier failed error=websocket: close 1006 (abnormal closure): unexpected EOF**

ERROR powchain: Subscription to new head notifier failed error=websocket: close 1006 (abnormal closure): unexpected EOF

I have been receiving this over and over today. I only get to about 4-8 thousand processed blocks.

docker run -it -v /tmp/prysm-data:/data -p 4000:4000 -p 13000:13000 gcr.io/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain:testFix --datadir=/data --p2p-host-ip <redacted>

This can be resolved by running your own Goerli node. The goerli node that we provide is not very stable with so many websocket connections. 

This error is mostly benign, your beacon chain node should attempt to reconnect and there is no penalty for not voting on eth1 data.
